summary: Harden multi-node image pulls and swarm runbook jobs against registry alias/digest drift

changes.description: Deploy worker now rewrites loopback/`registry` pull hosts to the manager WireGuard IP in multi-node swarms so worker nodes can pull runtime images consistently.
Swarm runbook jobs now avoid digest-pinned tagged refs and use `--no-resolve-image` to prevent create-time failures when registry digests rotate.
